SEVENUS until Jul 30, 2018

Introduction

Jeon Chi Bin is a South Korean singer and actor under One Cool Jacso Entertainment. He was a member of the boy group MASC and was a pre-debut member of MustB.He left the group on July 30, 2018. He participated in the survival show Stars Awakening.
